post:
Dedicated Server Plans:

**SM-L5640**: [$55/month](https://nexril.net/order/29)

* Supermicro X8-based System
* 2x Intel Xeon L5640 Processors (2.8 GHz, 6c / 12t)
* 48 GB DDR3 ECC Memory
* 250 GB HDD


**SM-X5675**: [$80/month](https://nexril.net/order/33)

* Supermicro X8-based System
* 2x Intel Xeon X5675 Processors (3.46 GHz, 6c / 12t)
* 96 GB DDR3 ECC Memory
* 250 GB HDD


**SM-E3-1271v3**: [$70/month](https://nexril.net/order/34)

* Supermicro X10-based System
* Intel Xeon E3-1271v3 Processor (4.00 GHz, 4c / 8t)
* 32 GB DDR3 ECC Memory
* 250 GB SSD

<hr>

All dedicated servers come with the following features:

* 15 TB Bandwidth @ 1 Gbps Port Speed
* /29 IPv4 + /64 IPv6 on Private VLAN
* DDoS Protection
* Dedicated Control Panel (bandwidth graphs, power management, rDNS management, IPMI session)
* < 24 Hour Setup Time

<hr>

We also offer a variety of upgrades and customization options including additional IPv4 and IPv6 addresses. We can accommodate requests of any size with valid justification.

Drive Upgrades (Up to 4 drives total per server):

* 250 GB HDD
* 1 TB HDD
* 2 TB HDD
* 250 GB SSD
* 500 GB SSD
* BYOD (Bring Your Own Drive)

<hr>

Network Looking Glass: https://lg.nexril.net/<br>
Test IPv4: 161.129.152.2<br>
Test IPv6: 2602:fece:1::1000
